LiquidFun Build and Run Instructions
LiquidFun Build and Run Instructions

LiquidFun is an extension of Box2D, a 2D physics engine for games.

API documentation is located in the Documentation/ folder and referenced by our landing page.

If your project already uses Box2D, please see these instructions for Porting from Box2D.

Instructions on how to build for:

  • Android
  • iOS
  • Linux
  • Windows
  • OS X
  • JavaScript version
